author: Jon Porter
title: Alphabet’s Loon prepares for commercial launch in Kenya with internet balloon tests
description: Project Loon could be just weeks away from launching its first commercial service in Kenya. The company’s balloons are currently performing network testing and could launch in partnership with Telkom Kenya soon.
content:
The balloons are currently performing network testing
A Loon balloon as it takes off.
Image: Loon
Project Loon, the Alphabet division that aims to use high-altitude balloons to supply internet to remote communities, could be just weeks away from launching … [+2124 chars]
